content.detailedDescription: i live on the eastern edge of queen creek, az. and  have a very good view of the night sky to the northeast, east, and the southeast. tonight  my adult son was visiting and i was showing him saturn, then the orion nebula through my celestron telescope. after showing him these objects i set the scope to go to another nearby nebula, and glanced at the s.E. sky as the scope was slewing. clearly visible coming toward us in the distance was a large object with two very bright lights, one at each end. i grabbed my binoculars and as i watched, the object stopped, then receded at an incredible speed. as it receded i could see a haze forming around the lights. this went from sitting there to being completely gone in less then 10 seconds. the object was very similar in size to the published pics of the phoenix lights object in 1997. (the 8:30 sighting, not the later one which was claimed to have been flares) going over this in my mind i've been unable to come up with an explanation for this sighting other than what i've stated above. it absolutely was not any aircraft,flares or other terrestrial object i've ever seen before.
content.summary: 2 lights at the ends of a very large object in s.E sky (similar to in size to phx lights object) appeared then  receded  at  an incredible  speed.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend were at the window and saw this amazing swarm of ufo.I think that's what it is! at first i thought it was a flock of birds but what caught my eye was that they were flying in a pretty amazing formation.As a hobbyist skywatcher i always have my binoculars at hand and wow,i could not believe it!Went to find my camera while my girlfriend was shocked with her binocular sight.It disappeared as balloons in the wind out of our sight.
content.summary: Multiple worm like spheres dancing in formation.

content.detailedDescription:
i haven't told anyone of this before, and i'm going to be deliberately vague on certain details even now, as i do not wish to be labeled 'one of those ufo kooks'. since i'm no longer young, i do think i should at least put it in writing as there still remains the remote possibility of physical evidence.

this event happened in may (or at least late spring/early summer) of 1957, when i was still a pre-teen farm boy. the time was mid-day, as my mother was preparing lunch; the weather was warm, winds were calm and the sky was cavu. the geographical location was approximately 350 air miles north of edmonton, alberta. exact co-ordinates would of course be provided to a professional investigator, if accompanied by the assurance of confidentiality.

i was helping, or perhaps hindering, my father work on his 1954 chevy pickup; he was cleaning it up in preparation for trading it off on a new car, which is one reason i remember the event so well. i was a pretty excited kid.

the hood was up on the pickup, which was parked facing east and a mere 4 or 5 paces from the front of the house; he and my mother were carrying on a conversation through the open, south facing kitchen window as she prepared lunch.

in those years there were no jet aircraft, or even air services of any kind (beyond the odd rumbling beaver, otter or norseman bush plane) in that rather remote farming community. there was, however, at least one local resident who flew an aeronca champ, and another with a piper j3.

later research indicates that there were, at that time, no established long distance commercial air routes that passed over that area using either piston engine or jet aircraft. there were no military air bases for at least several hundreds of miles, and there was no subsequent air or ground search activity. under the circumstances, a search would have been impossible to conceal from the local population.

in the north-eastern sky i noticed what i later came to know as a contrail, which i duly pointed out to my father. it was advancing in a north-to-south direction at considerable speed - as fast as i would now expect a modern fighter to 'pull a con', and somewhat faster than the contrails of current commercial airliners.

it is important to note that at no time did i see "an object". i only saw the the effects of a flying object which remains unidentified.

the trail began within my field of view, starting from nothing to a thin white thread and rapidly thickening to the now-common white contrail, but then quickly changing from white to light brown, then to denser, dark brown. 

the trail then abruptly turned from horizontal to apparently vertical. i acknowledge that the object may have been simply climbing steeply, either directly toward or away from my point of observation, giving the appearance of vertical flight. the 'trail' very rapidly continued darkening from brown to apparently black, whereupon there was a spherical 'puffball' as the object exploded. the 'puffball' would have perhaps covered a golf ball held at arms length. during this time, i do not recall any sound - this was simply a silent event in a brilliant blue sky. the event spanned an estimated 20-25 degrees horizontally, and an estimated 3-5 degrees vertically. the vertical element was brief, and took perhaps three seconds.

i recall my mother asking what we were gawking at, and my father responding that we had just seen something explode. a few seconds later - i can only estimate 5 to 7 seconds, and i realise this is the most critical component of the observation - the blast wave arrived. it was strong enough to shake the open hood of my fathers pickup, and soundly rattle the windows in the house, which of course also brought my mother out to see what was going on. the remains of the contrail and the 'puffball' hung in the sky for at least several more seconds before gradually dissipating, giving her plenty of time for a good look. i am also aware that a blast wave travels faster than the speed of sound, and that the event probably happened a considerable distance away, which would have put it over a vast forested area that remains completely unpopulated to this day.

during wwii, canada had established a group called the goc, or ground observer corps. this consisted largely of airforce veterans and private pilots; their purpose was to record the time, direction and type of aircraft that were noticed passing overhead. this was started, no doubt, from fears of enemy invasion but was continued post-war to aid in search and rescue efforts in a time when there was no reliable long distance radio contact with civilian aircraft. one such fellow (the airforce veteran with the aforementioned aeronca champ, and one of the few people who actually had a telephone!) was a neighbor and family friend. my father immediately contacted him, and he in turn reported it as a possible accident. several days later, he was simply informed that there were no aircraft reported missing.

over the next while, at least one other area farmer cautiously mentioned seeing the event and feeling the blast wave. even then, i had the impression that it was spoken of warily; that if you spoke of something unexplainable, you were likely to be ridiculed.

the event fascinated me enough that the details remain as clear as if they happened very recently; i truly don't think i've lost or altered anything. i have been at the exact point of observation regularily, and the angles, directions, and intervals remain clear in my mind.
content.summary: Another 'uneducated farmer' report from a place you've never heard of.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my dog out and while it does its thing i tend to stare up at the stars in hopes of seeing a falling star. it was about 10:30pm maybe later and the sky was clear and the stars were bright. i looked around and saw what i first thought to be a falling star. i remember being glad that i hadn't missed it and noticing how bright it was. after a moment or so i realized that the "star" was not disappearing as expected. it was then that i noticed a twin light was running parallel to the first. both lights were red, and i know you must be thinking it must have been a plane, i thought this as well. even with that thought in mind, if it were a plane it did not have the characteristics i would expect such as the color red on a plane is much brighter, the color tone not the light. the ones i was watching were almost a maroon orange texture. there was also no blinking lights as you see on commercial aircraft and the like. even then i would have dismissed it had it not been for what happened next. as i stood and watched the lights dropped and flew over my head and out to the horizon and disappeared at a phenomenal speed. further more there was no sound, in fact my dog did not even notice. the lights were approximately 1000 feet overhead or less, and the final thing that made me ponder was the fact that though the lights were moving at such tremendous speed there was no streak effect as you would find with fast moving light. in other words if you have ever been camping and placed the end of a stick in the fire until it was glowing and waved it around to see the circles and streaks in the air, these lights did not have that effect.
content.summary: Two redish lights came from a great height and flew at unreal speed directly overhead, no sound, too fast for detail.

content.detailedDescription: I was out working about 15 miles nw of aztec,nm surveying for the local utility company. my job was to do a survey routes for electrical distribution lines, and i have been around large to medium sized substations and distribution lines. i was parked at a gas compressor site and eating lunch while listening to the radio. i heard a loud buzzing sound, i figured that i parked near a bee hive. i was concerned that i may have parked near bee hive and i needed to survey the area. i looked around and i didn't see any bees or a hive. the sound was so loud that it seemed to be all around me. i could not figure out what was making the noise. it sounded like a higher pitch than the normal 60hz hum that is created by high power lines or even substations. i went around the site and eventually looked up. i seen an isoscles triangle flying above, it was flat black with no markings. i figured that it was approximately 2000' in the air and moving very slow. it didn't have any lights, it was nothing like i have ever seen. i've seen f117 stealth fighters, and they are more like a "v" shape with a pronounced gap between the wings and rear section of the plane. this wasn't no f117 stealth fighter, it was an unidentified flying object. it flew from the south to north in a straight line while emitting a loud buzzing sound. i really wasn't shocked, i didn't know what to think. it was nothing like i have ever seen, my first reaction was, "what the hell is that?". i didn't have any optical surveying equipment to zero in on the object, to get a better view. all i had was a mobile survey grade gps device. it just flew to the north until it was out of sight.
content.summary: Black triangle emits loud buzz.

content.detailedDescription:
I looked over from my car window when i was parked waiting to pick someone up and i noticed an object moving across the skyline above a building, i got my phone out and opened the camera option and took a photo of the object, i looked at the picture but the object had not shown up and therefore i lifted it back up to take another more zoomed in photo and just as i was doing this the object changed direction and disappeared.
the object looked like a line with two lines crossing it, i have attatched a picture of the shape of the ufo as it was so unusual and i would love to hear if another of this shape has ever been captured. the object moved in stages, travelling quickly then pausing then continuing moving, it suddenly turned once i was taking the second picture and disappeared. email: busybunny@live.Co.Uk
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Unusual shape ufo seen above building near birmingham.

content.detailedDescription:
1) my family and i were in a small north houston motel where we had planned to wait out the hurricane. it was september 13, 2008 and i had seen on the news that the eye was enetring galveston island. the weather outdoors was already very windy and a hard rain falling. i got out of bed to see first hand what the storm was doing in the event that i had to provide additional protection to my family. i was very much awake and alert.

2) at first only through the lightening could i see any further than the nearby parked vehicles and motel buildings. i stepped just out the door but quickly returned inside as the wind was strong and i did not want to get knocked over. after a few minutes i opened the door again to look at the storm. it was then that i saw a very emerald green object directly in front of me. the color was strong but did not seem to be bright or lighting up anything nearby. there seemed to have been a greenish halo of a less intense light that surrounded its configuration. it at first looked to be triangular in shape but, then seemed to be rectangular. the distance was only 100-150 yards from me.

3)the light seemed to be at first suspended, motionless, and soundless. the object completely blocked a 6-10 story building that was directly behind it. i stood in place looking at the object a good 2 minutes when my 11 year old son asked if he could get out of bed to see the storm. i gave my approval and he came and stood next to me. he immediately saw the object and asked what it was. i said, "so you see it too". i told him that i did not know what it was. the object then made strange slow movements while never leaving its location. the movements made it clear to me that it was three dimensional.

4) the entire time of the sighting, i was trying to determine the source. i first though that it was a mirage or reflection of other lights. the strong hurricane winds and rain did not seem to have any effect on the object. the movements that it was making made it appear as if they were self controlled and intelligent. the object did not spin, it did not rotate, it did not zig zag. the best i can describe the motion is that of a slide show in which different views of a same object is seen on a big screen but, of different sides.

5) during the first moments of the sighting, i stared at it and then around it trying to explain to my self what it was that i was seeing, in a logical fashion. i was very curious. when i could not find an explanation i became a little frightened. because my son was standing next to me i did not want to frighten my son so i acted as normal as i could. the object and movements led me to believe that it wanted to get noticed. after about five minutes of seeing this object, i closed the door and for a few minutes and then went back to the door with my son and opened it to look outside. the object was gone.

i have been bothered by the fact that i have not reported this incident. this incident is absoluely true and i now report to the best of my ability.
content.summary: During hurricane ike i and my 11 year old son witnessed an emerald green ufo about 150 yards away.

content.detailedDescription:
we were driving home from a trip to san diego and had just left yuma. myself, my wife and our two kids plus a friend of our sons was with us. after driving for about 45 minutes out of yuma just past the mohawk rest stop and my son and his friend asked what the object was in the sky. i was in the passenger side of our van and looked to the sky where they were pointing (southwest over the desert). sitting the the front passenger side and heading east i had to look over my left sholder at about 3pm on a clock to see them. as we were driving we noticed several cars parked on the side of the road looking at the same lights. 

     what we saw were two orbs a good distance apart. one was orange in color and the other was yellow. the stayed mnotionless for over 3 minutes from the time we started looking at them. we thought they might be flares but they did not move and did not appear to have any smoke and did not appear to be moving downward. the objects faded out and then re-appeared father south and east (from my point of view they were infront and to the right of the passenger side of our van (we could not tell how high in the sky they were). i used my cell phone to take pictures and have attached them. they are not the best photos but at least i got a few as well as my wife who was driving, i also believe that my son and his friend got some pics on their cell phones. 

     the objects stayed there for a short period of time (1 minute 23 seconds) then faded again. this happend the entire way to gila bend. they faded in and out for several seconds or for several minutes. once we reached the gila bend shell station we continued to watch the orbs and then they seemed to dissapear. my son and his friend stopped in the rest room at the shell and were talking about the orbs and a local said that they see some wierd stuff out there and as long as they leave him alone he did not care. 

i have several photos. it did not appear to us when taking them that we have more than two in some. we were trying to find red and blue lights on the objects to see if they were planes but did not see any. we also did notice many flashing lights from planes that appeared to be following these lights and they seemed much more erratic and the orbs stayed stationary.
content.summary: Two orbs (orange and yellow) appeared sometimes for 2 plus minutes and sometimes for less than 5 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: Hello, my girlfriend and i were just outside and there were two lights that appeared out of no where, stayed stationary and hovered. approx. a mile away from our house. they weren't there when we came out.  through the binoculars they looked like straight lines with two shining lights. eventually, after about a minute, they flew off.
content.summary: Two connected bright lights.

content.detailedDescription:
March 10th, 2009 at and between the times of 9:23pm to9:27pm, this is what i saw and my report.
  
    i thought it was any ordinary jet approaching from the south of me. it had two white lights on each side from this front view. it was about the same size of an ordinary jet perhaps larger. i dismissed it. but nothing else was flying in the area so i watched it comes towards me with 10x50 bushnell binoculars . it went over at about a 12:30 position above me, at about 3,000 feet. it had no sound what so ever, this alarmed me that it was not a ordinary air craft. it had no lights on the bottom, just the two side white side lights. it did have a very short exhaust or vapor trail, perhaps a third of the width of the craft. after it passed over me, i noticed it had two lights near the center and above the level of the two outside white light.  the two lights seemed very small and pin point, but intense. the two center lights were off set at about a 45 degree angle, with the red light higher than the white one. they were blinking one at a time. at this time i tried to take a picture to get pattern of the lights on the rear of this craft. my digital camera would not work. i pushed the shutter button repeatedly. my camera isn���t very good at night. it was getting to far away so i abandon the camera. i quickly looked through my binocular that are mounted on a tripod. i quickly found it and i watched it go out by the airport. where it appeared to stop after it slowed down. it speed up then slowed down and then speed up and then slowed  down and moved nnw out of sight. the next day i called the airport and they told me the height of the jets at my address upon approach to land. they told me they would look into this matter and said he believed me. during the time this craft was above me, i should have been able to see what was in between the two lights, but i only saw a white mass, no shape. on regular airplanes i can see the fuselage, wings etc from all the way across the valley. on my march 5th sighting, i think this is the same craft that was ne of downtown salt lake city.  it stayed above the mountain range motionless for 15 plus minutes before taking off and going north. from the rear view it seemed to have the same light pattern.
content.summary: Silent running craft passes over me, in slc, ut.

content.detailedDescription:
I got up to go to the bath room downstairs and when i return to bed i sat on the edge of the bed for second (i had downstairs then back upstairs so my heart was pumping from moving from one end of the house to the other and now i was totally awake). i realized that it was pretty bright out because of a full moon (either that night or the night before or after the full moon).  i was admirering how well i could see the trees on the hill in mr johnson's cow pasture.  then suddenly i saw this orange light come over the top of the hill.  my first reactions were "those reacoon murders are out hunting" then i realized there isn't a road that is on the hill and the orange light is floating over the trees.  i got up and went to the window to get a better look.  my brain was going  so fast trying to figure out what it was and wasn't.My brain said not ahelicopter, not an ultra glide, not a plane  there is no noise no nothing but movement.  what i saw was pumpkin orange lights (one repeatative light that in a da da da da motion)  that rotated only a 1/4 of the circle or length of the object. as it moved down the side of the hill over the trees my mind raced to think what it could be  no noise no shape that i could see only the lights moving slowly down the side of the hill.  that was for maybe 30 seconds then the object started to move laterial toward mm highway.  we own the other house next to where i was watching and as the object started to move in that direction half way down the side of the hill still over the trees still invisible but visible.  it reminded me of the car in harry potter just before it goes totally invisible, that state.
as the object moved toward the (west) house i thought i'm not going to see this if i don't go into the front room, then realized that the large maple tree will block the view.  as  moved across the room and move to the window in the front room excited that i could still see the object, the object moved between my west house and the neighbors as it moved over highway 72 the moon cast a shadow onto the object which left a shadow on the highway as it moved over the trees  on the lowery property.  my guess is that the shadow was as large as our welding shop some 40 feet by 60 feet. then is continued to move toward e highway through the woods. astonished at what i saw i went back to the bedroom and by then my husband was awaken. i told him i believed that i had just seen a ufo and matter of factly said  you probably did.  this area has been know to support lots of ufo( activity i've spoken to many people some have even have missed time.  the folks that i have spoken to say kilarny lake had lots of activity and city lake in ironton and also des ark.
content.summary: Visible but invisible at the same time with pumpkin colored lites.

content.detailedDescription: Siting on the balcony on the hill one hot summer geting some fresh air i noticed something strange in the sky. it didn't look like a airplain it didn't have any wings. the space ship was disc silver shaped it was dark could see the shinning silver. the thing i noticed there was three green circled lights are in the space ship.The one in the middle was going side by side and it the space ship with the three green lights was coming towards me and the city!
content.summary: Magic.

content.detailedDescription: I was at avogadros number restaurant at 4:30 pm sitting on back patio with friends, looked up, and saw a shiny, stationary, object.I was excited because i knew what i was seeing. i pointed it out to everybody (there were 7 of us) but only 3 others saw it. it sat there and flickered, then moved to the left about 1/4 of inch, then back again. it kept flickering and was very bright. nobody else seemed to care but i grew excited having several other viewings in the past. i ran inside to find someone with a digital camera but found no one. came back outside but failed to see the object again. as i looked in the vicinity, a white tube came screaming past where i was looking, moving in a westward direction. it looked as though it moved end over end a few times before getting out of view. i quickly drove home to get my camera but had no luck in spotting anyting else. the whole sighting lasted 5 minutes. it was as if i was given a showing for all of my skywatching diligence. the tube flying by made me gasp as i've never seen a tube before, only on ufo shows, it's speed was crazy and seemed to be very high in the sky.
content.summary: Shiny object, sudden movements, tube object, end over end.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a humid summer night in southern iowa.  i was on a car ride with six of my friends. we were told by the driver of the car that we were to go meet a 'friend'.  we drove to the country into a quiet, secluded valley on a shale road.  the car was stopped at the bottom and we all jumped out to wait for the 'friend' to show.  nothing happened for a while.  eventually, the driver announced the friend was on his way as he pointed to the sky.  the rest of us went along with the story, laughing and making jokes about the new 'friend' who was about to join us.  things changed when we soon saw something that looked like a star slowing moving across the sky. 
    as i watched it, i didn't really think much of it--it was possibly an airplane until it was obviously moving towards us.  everyone decided to get back into the car.  it ultimately became clear that it wasn't a star because it became bigger and bigger. it was a spaceship.  to give an idea of it's size-there were many willow trees in the valley where we were parked and the ship size spanned the width of the willow grove.  by this time my friends and i were terrified.  the driver announced that he was leaving to go visit his 'friend.'  my girlfriend was begging him not to leave us.  her brother demanded to go with the driver, scared but trying to be brave.  the driver told him no, that he should stay with us.  i tried to hide from the blinding light that was flooding in on us.  i began whispering to my girlfriend to be quiet as she was crying uncontrollably.  we tried our best to be quiet and our terror subsided after a few minutes when we began to realize that we were ok.  i peeked out the window.  what i saw next will remain with me the rest of my life.  
    i clearly saw a silver colored saucer shaped ship with a raised bump on the top side.  the bottom was smooth.  the white light came from the bottom of the ship--that's the light that lit up the entire road and the willow grove.  around the perimeter of the ship, there were colored lights that seemed to pulsate.  the entire time, it was completely silent. it hovered above the trees.  when it left, it was gone in a snap of an instant, angleing right up into the sky.  the driver returned to the car, jumped in, and we drove back to town saying nothing--no one said a word.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Slow moving 'star' that moved in and became larger turning into a spacecraft-blinding bright light and silent.

content.detailedDescription:
On march 14, 2009 at 5:23pm, approximately, i went outside to stretch my legs after having watched a movie. i try to always bring my binoculars with me when i go outside and just walk around.It had been cloudy earlier in the day but had changed to sparse clouds by 5:00pm.

i noticed a plane to the ne that appeared to be traveling nne at began looking through my binoculars (10x50). the plane appeared to be a 727 or some other commercial jet, but the most unusual thing was that the body was pink w/ white wings. it wasn't extremely high altitude, maybe 20,000ft or so. due to its strange color i watched it for about 15 seconds when suddenly a white or reflective (since the sun was behind me to the west) spherical object moved past the plane, appeared to quickly loop around it, stopped for about 6 seconds, and then moved into a nearby cloud. i left looking at the plane to look at where the object moved into the cloud. it appeared again out of the cloud, moved sideways for about 5 seconds, then entered another spot in the same cloud. i continued to watch for 15 more seconds but it did not appear again.

1. the object appeared to be near the plane and had looped behind the plane at one point. 
2. the plane was at a distance and high altitude.
3. at the previously mentioned distance, the object appeared to be about the size of one of the jet engines.
4. appeared to be moving faster than the plane.
content.summary: Object moving around plane, disappearing into cloud.

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving my home at 3:30 am to catch a 5:35 am flight from the grand rapids airport.The temp outside was about 16 degrees f. as i came down the stairs from the bedroom i looked out the window as it was very clear, star filled early morning. a lovely almost full moon was visible lighting the landscape. i noticed off to the east a flaming object that i at first took to be space debris entering the atmosphere but it was moving slowly. it was headed west. the next thought was its a small plane and i thought perhaps it was in trouble because of the fire ball coming from it. the object was flying horizontal and at about the altitude that small planes fly in the area since the park township airport is just about a mile away.
the object then stopped and hovered just off of my property line to the south and perhaps midway between my home and lake macatawa which is on the other side of the road from my home and maybe two or three hundred yards away.
i went outside and watched it hover for a few minutes until it slowly rose up vertically and to the south until it disappeared.
it made no sound that i can recall in the dense cold air.

i felt that the object was "deliberate". that is the word that came to my mind while i was watching it.
content.summary: Most noticeable was the fireball or flame from the bottom. too dark to see exact form of object.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 3 am we were driving westbound on a nearly empty hwy  at about 70 mph  around mm 71 approx when i looked into one of the many valleys that run no to so in that area when i passed one that was illuminated by a bright red sort of incandescent lite and near the bottom of the valley there appeared to be an object that looked like a small submarine with multi lites hovering about 40 feet off the ground in a valley that was no more than 150 to 200 feet deep. it was to the south from our vantage on the west bound side. we passed it rather quickly at our speed just long enough to see it and that it had the entire valley lit up.  it surprised me and i sort of exclaimed " what the hell was that !"  i dont know what it was, but i know what it was not.  it was not moving and it had no wings or rotors.  it looked a little like the  trieste bathysphere from the marrieannis trench dives. i think the object was probobley no larger than a small rv.  we moved onwards towards barstow cal.  and i began to forget about it for perhaps 45 mins to an hour, and  then just as we began to near barstow i rolled down my drivers side window and for some reason i looked over my left shoulder behind us and there prob. about 500 to 700 feet to the left rear of me the same object with the same unmistakeable color and hue was moving in the same direction and speed that we were. it was 700 to 1000 ft off the ground just at the edge of the cloud cover. there was an intense sort of santa anna wind effect that was blowing very hard that evening  so hard that it was moving the truck but it didnt seem to affect the object at all.  at that point i took my foot off the gas and let the truck slow somewhat, i leaned out of the truck and looked back directly at the object and got a better look at it, and as i craned my head out of the window over a period of prob. 30 seconds the object seemed to be aware that i was looking at it and it moved upwards and into a bank of quickly moving clouds that obscured it but as it moved away it illuminated the cloud bank as it left and then it was gone. with the better look at it , it seemed to be bell shaped, almost like an inverted bell and the way the lites on it seemed to be moving upwards from bottom to top  it kind of looked like a xmas tree orniment  it almost seemed to resemble  one of those deep sea jellyfish with the phospherescent lites moving up and down on them. {pardon my spellings }  i knew i should report this somewhere but i didnt really know where.  this really happened and pretty much as i described.  i dont know what it was, but i know what it was not; not any conventional aircraft that i have ever seen. it didnt move at any exceptional speeds, but to me it seemed to be aware that i had noticed it and somewhat diverted its course into the clouds as i slowed down and turned around and looked at it.  i dont know how long it had been ghosting us  so to speak or how long it had been going in our direction from where i first saw it, but i almost got the impression that it had been observing us after we first noticed it; we may have gotten its attention when we first saw it.  i almost got the feeling that instead of its being a craft it may have been a life form itself.  maybe thats just my imagination (?)  you may contact me if you feel you need to.   sincerely
content.summary: My wife and i were driving an 18 wheeler on hwy i40 at approx. mm  70 to 77 just  outside barstow, ca.

content.detailedDescription: I took this photo as i could not identify the object as an aircraft. this was taken looking north east from my house into the sky over manchester city centre. it did not move and was in the sky for around 30 minutes. i would just like to know if anything like this has been seen anywheere before of if it can be explained. i remain open minded!
content.summary: Light in sky spotted looking over manchester city centre.

content.detailedDescription: My fiance and i were driving north bound on lisle road one night toward town. i was in the passenger seat and my attention was imediatly captured. this object was too low to be a star. bright white light illuminated it. saturn was visible that time of month but was in a more western part of the sky i think. i imediatly began to realize that this thing wasn't moving. no lights indicating a plane. i looked and stared at it to move, but the contour of the road, the turns...Made me realize this thing was stationary. i had to move closer tho the windshield to keep my eyes on it and i knew something was up when we went right underneath of it! it had to be about 1,000 ft. up, i say that because the planes that usually land at the bluegrass airport, nearby in lexington , are seen around that altitude when assuming their descention. i began to lose sight of it when we turned a corner and it disappeared over the tree line. only when i turned around to see it throught he rear windshield, did my fiance turn and ask what was going on. i just shrugged it off, and told him he would think i was going crazy. a couple of days later, i was coming down lisle rd. the opposite way during the day and to the left of me is i-75, to the right, open field and a 200 ft. radio communications tower. as i approached the railroad tracks near the tower, i notice multiple satellite dishes. 15'-20' in diameter. pointed in the same direction. this is where i first noticed this object, i remembered and it gave me goosebumps. i'm not supposed to think that there are extraterrestrials out there, it is against my faith, i am not wrong in what i saw and i haven't been able to stop reasearching since. this is the first time i've contacted an organization that i trust about it. all i know is.....My life will never be the same.
content.summary: Lower than a star. nowhere in the vicinity of saturn that night. hovering. bright white light. near i-75 , seemed to get brighter at times.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a trip with my friend to drive to the west coast from rochester ny.  in the middle of the night,we were driving in the utah or nevada dessert and i slowly approached a light that i could see for about two or three miles away.  as i got to the light, which was about 500 to 600 meters away from the road on the passenger side, it appeared that i could not get away from it, it appeared to be following me parallel to the road and my car path once i got to a 90 degree angle of it.
i decided to look at my clock, and my speed, and it turns out that this light object followed my car for about 12 to 15 minutes, and i was going 75 miles per hour(about 15 miles it followed me).  from 500 meters off of the road on the passenger side, the object lit up the dessert and my car so bright as if you turned the light on in a dark room.  the object floated above the ground, close to the ground, as it followed us.  it was a white light, and it slowly "let us go" as it quit keeping up with me.  at the time i didn't think anything of this, but the more i think about it, it seems weird.  what kind of energy goes into creating a light which can light up my car from 500 meters away.  i worked in video production and i know a 1k light is barely enough to be a spot light for 150 feet.
there was nothing in the dessert, not other lights nor other cars nor rest stops.  this object was out in the middle of nowhere, the ground was flat in between myself and the object.  this is the truth.
content.summary: Bright light follows my car for 15 miles.

content.detailedDescription: I saw it when going in my back door i noticed it because there are no stars at that low in the sky and this one is extremely bright. i thought maybe it was a planet but planets/stars ect..Dont act like this. i went in a grabbed my binoculars and steady them on the top of the car parked in the driveway. thats when i witnessed it was changing shapes, size, intensity, and occasionally it will drop something out the bottom and it will hang there for a few seconds and then it goes back up into it again. it will also split in 2 for a few seconds and the rejoin and reshape again. this started 4 nights ago and has been there every night from sundown till about 9 to 10pm. then slowly drops out of sight. this takes about 5 to 10 minutes before its down out of sight. i dont know of any stars or planets that behave this way. my wife and i jumped in the car last night to try and get closer to it, we drove at least 15 miles towards it and it just seemed to slip away as we closed on it. as far as feelings and emotions...I just want to know what this is. if its a ufo...Then lets find out before it leaves for good. this is not a case of i saw it and now its gone...This thing has been here 4 nights in a row. i have video and stills of it. the video and a few of the stills were taken with the camera sitting aon the rear window of the car so as to eliminate shaking. i'm telling you send someone out here...Pronto
content.summary: Starts by looking like a brilliant star and constantly changes shape, size, intensity etc.

content.detailedDescription:
To whomever can help me.  i am a 41 year old woman.  i work as a nursing supervisor in a rehabilitation center.  i am married with 4 children and 2 grandchildren.  i lead a pretty normal life.  but there is something that has stayed with me since the age of 14.  here goes...I asleep in my living room, on the couch.  it was sometime in the mddle of the night.  at first i thought it was a dream, but now i do not believe so.  i awoke to a humming, almost a vibration in my head.  the room which was pitch black was all lit from a bright light source coming from outside the windows.  the curtains were blowing almost completely horizontal.  i remeber trying to move but i was paralyzed.  all i could do was open my eyes.  this humming and bright light lasted for what seemed like an eternity.  i would guess 30 min or so.  thats all i can remember.  the next day i was terrified.  the fear stayed with me allthese years.  if it was a dream, it would have faded.  also less than a week after my experience my mother and her friend followed a disc shaped object in the night sky that was illuminated with bright yelow lights all around it which seemed to move in unnatural directions, less than 10 miles from my home.  i never told anyone of my experience until now for fear of ridicule.  what happened.  can anyone help me?

-- 
sharon foster
6080 updyke road
trumansburg ny 14886
tel#607-229-9595
content.summary: Strange humming/vibration in head with paralysis with sitting following less than 1 wk after.

content.detailedDescription: I was out in the early morning walking my dog. it was 5:45. i was looking east, up my street when i looked up and saw this long grey box shape coming toward me in the sky.It was coming at me from over the houses rather then the street. at first i thought it was a plane but then i relized it was not. it was very silent with out any noise. as it came to be right above me, i, becoming nervous and kinda scared, moved to my porch and looked up. the bottom was grey, with what looked like black lines on it. it looked like it was 2 stories high, and by that i mean it had 2 stories. it had lines on top and bottom that made it look like it had windows, but with no lights. as it moved on i noticed the only lights i could see .It had three lights. 2 red ones , one on each side, and one white, in the middle. as it came over the houses, it curved and moved over the street and out toward the north. from the time i first saw it to the moment it glided over me and on out of sight was about 10 minutes. if you would like to contact me i have given my name and email address. thank you..
content.summary: Grey, silent long box shape with 2 stories of what looks like colorless window side by side. bottom was grey with black lines.

content.detailedDescription: we were comming home from geneva n.Y. sat. jan. 24 2009 when we noticed a bright light in the sky to the left of us. we thought it might be a helicopter. it took us half hour to get home and it was moving in front of us to our left. when we got home we noticed the light stopped over canandaigua lake. we went out on our deck and watched it for one and a half hours. while watching it we noticed it was glowing like a cystal ball while rotationing and changing shapes.We have seen this several nights. it seems to appear around 7p.M. sometimes it goes quickly and other times it seems to stay longer. tonight mar.13 2009 we saw it for one half hour. this time my husband noticed a smaller beam of light flew from the round object.
content.summary: Round object crystal ball shaped changing shapes like a jelly fish.

content.detailedDescription: i was just taking a lunch break and going for a walk when i had this sensation that i had better look up, and as i did i immediatly saw this black round object that seemed to float, spin, and dip along in the air. i was determined to not take my eyes off of it for one moment. the object stayed in my field of view for approximately two minutes total. the wind was out of the southwest at a brisk fifteen m.P.H. the black object changed shape several times as i watched it. i thought at first it must be a plastic bag of some sort but it continued to fly directly against the wind! the approximate altitude i would guess was at about 1200 feet at first site. the object then moved directly over where i was standing and appeared to come closer to me, i would guess to about 800 ft. then i could clearly see the surface seemed to be folding in on itself! it did have a somewhat metalic (or plastic) shine to it. this thing then moved back up to about 1000 ft. and proceeded on its course to the southwest. the oddest thing that occured to me as i tried to give myself an honest evaluation as to its make-up was that it appeared to be trying to look like a plastic bag! as this thing began to move away i tried to hurry to a better spot so i could keep it in sight, and as i watched it changed to a classic saucer shape and a little further on to a delta wing shape. just amazing! it then was momentarily obscured by some trees, and i lost sight of it. i only wish i had my camera.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: While walking saw black somewhat round object over head.

content.detailedDescription: See scanned attachments for detailed description of various formations and objects.
content.summary: Hole in clouds, rectangular object  with changing glow, fast departure

content.detailedDescription: Ok, so i was walking home from the bus with my friends. my friend and i were just walking and i looked up (randomly). at first, i thought they were planes. but then i saw one just freeze in mid air. then the two other ones started flying towards each other and then move away, like a game. i showed my friend and he looked. he didn't see anything, so he just thought i was joking. when we walked a little further, i showed him again. they were a little more visible now. he could see them now and freaked out like "oh my god we gotta call someone!". we caught up with my other friends and they saw them right away. only one of my friends' couldn't see them. they were appearing and disappearing. we watched them for a bit and then they finally disappeared. we're still amazed at what we saw.
content.summary: 3 white dots.

content.detailedDescription: One day last summer when i went for the mail, i saw the sun reflecting off something in the driveway.  thinking it might be a piece of change, i checked it out.  it was a piece of metal, sort of melted looking.  i took it in the house and cleaned it up with soap and water, and asked my husband what he thought it was.  he said it looked like it broke off a piece of equipment and to throw it away.  however, when i examined it, it was flat on the back, and looked almost like designs on the front.  so, i started cleaning it with everything i could find to see if anything effected it.  i used every cleaner and chemical i had and then started on everything my husband used on the cars.  nothing changed it except to make it cleaner and shinier and make the design seem to stand out more.  before i threw it away, i wanted a second opinion, so i got in touch with mufon and they suggested i start here.  whether it could be anything or not, i don't know, but, i couldn't throw it away without checking first.
content.summary: Found a piece of unusual metal.

content.detailedDescription:
Objects (cigar-shaped lines) found on wwt, on friday march 13, 2009, and found as cut places on google earth. check by yourselves.

ra        dec

23:40:38,-02:15:30
23:40:53,-02:14:54
23:42:51,-02:12:15
23:42:55,-01:55:34
23:43:20,-01:51:10
23:44:32,-02:05:28
23:44:43,-02:01:25
23:45:26,-01:59:33
23:45:33,-02:01:16
23:45:16,-01:38:52
23:47:25,-01:26:37
23:47:34,-01:11:23
23:47:52,-01:05:46 (2 objects next to each other)
23:47:58,-01:12:56
23:47:20,-00:55:07
23:46:39,-00:34:42
23:46:31,-00:37:32
23:46:03,-00:38:56

 to cut the space is not an argument. and how about wwt that is a much better combination of several telescopes. a big fault if it is just a technical error! and even bigger, if it is something real behind!

search in wwt on both sides of the ecliptic, where the sun is expected to go or has recently been (now is in pisces). venus is relatively nearby. i think if something real is on orbit, it would be on sun-synchronous orbit similar to how soho moves around the sun in step with the earth.

i do not exclude the possibility all that to be just a technical bug, because there are large lines on other parts of the sky - across whole quadrants. see the north polar area on wwt. i guess someone wanted to show us that is exactly a technical error, by making these artificial large lines across the photos of the polar region! thus we will assume the real lines as errors too!
content.summary: Objects (cigar-shaped lines) found on wwt, and found as cut places on google earth.

content.detailedDescription:
Murrysville, pa - 11/15/08 - i was looking through my digital camera pics trying free up room on my hard drive. i was flipping through a series of pics i took on 11-15-08 around 5 pm during a wild cold front moving through our area, when this "shadow circle" caught my eye between 2 shots of the same "wall" clouds taken 10 seconds apart.  other pics reveal "things" upon zoomed inspection in the sky, but they could be discounted as flying debris because of the wind (leaves, branches, etc.).

i originally thought it looked only "suspicious", but after seeing similar pics on sites like webcamufo.Com that are apparently considered to be ufo-related, i wonder if this one "qualifies".  or, perhaps it's only a swirl created by some vortex-type cloud-thing?  i have uploaded the original camera files that remain just the way they came out of the camera (canon rebel xti):  img_3394.Jpg (with shadow) & img_3395jpg (10 seconds later). anyway, the pics are cool.
content.summary: Pa - suspicious shadow "circle" found on digital pics taken during cold front.
